name: The Dwarves
startIntroPart2: Great leader of the Dwarves, masters of the mountains deep, the greatest builders and miners to ever live. Please, take us into the future once more, and bring glory to our name.
declaringWar: You've made a mockery of our kind for too long.
attacked: You have made an enemy of the very mountains this day.
defeated: May our castles and tunnels outlive your tyrany.
introduction: May our kingdoms know peace and our coffers gold.
hateHello: What do ya want surface dweller?
hateNo: Do you treat eveyone with such disrespect?
afterPeace: Now scram! Dont much want of you right now.
tradeRequest: We were hoping you might be in need of a few things, all craftsmanship is of the highest quality.
uniqueName: The Beating Heart of the Mountain
